creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
To reproduce:
- Create a Java Sampler element
- Select one of the arguments
- Press "Delete"
- Click on another element in the test plan
- Click back on the Java Sampler
The argument you just deleted has reappeared. It wasn't there when you left (I
know because the Java Config element now works, and it wouldn't otherwise). It
has been placed back there when you re-selected the sampler.
